name: Time goes by
description:
In Time goes by, you are in control of how time progresses. Help Granny prepare her house and garden for the change of seasons by doing various chores, year after year, or simply spend some time relaxing and contemplating while you enjoy the beautiful and tranquil environment.

This game was created by Marius Mühleck, Stella Phung and Ilona Treml during the Spring Jam at the University of Bayreuth in 2019.
